entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Meadow Lake Airport 07:36 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this morning. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:27 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 06:27 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:27 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
